LABEL: 0x4BB
STRING: I can hear the sound of the wind.

LABEL: 0x4FA
STRING: The grass sways in the gentle breeze, bringing with it the scent of white flowers.

LABEL: 0x553
STRING: A clear starry sky, which I hadn't seen in years, stretches endlessly across my eyes.

LABEL: 0x5C5
STRING: Ah, that's right.

LABEL: 0x5E6
STRING: I've finally reached the outside.

LABEL: 0x653
STRING: "You've finally broken free from that place, haven't you?"

LABEL: 0x6B1
STRING: A girl I knew well, whispered in a familiar voice.

LABEL: 0x706
STRING: Her young figure, a vision from a distant past.

LABEL: 0x779
STRING: "You don't need to worry about him anymore."

LABEL: 0x7F6
STRING: "You are already free now. You can go wherever you wish."

LABEL: 0x863
STRING: ...Ah, I see.

LABEL: 0x886
STRING: Is that so...

LABEL: 0x8C3
STRING: After making many sacrifices, I had finally earned my freedom.

LABEL: 0x946
STRING: "The future is marked on the dice you roll... what will it look like?"

LABEL: 0x9C4
STRING: Well, I must proceed.

LABEL: 0x9E3
STRING: To where the manifest gods and the foul rulers of this world are calling me...

LABEL: 0xCCF
STRING: I hear the sound of water dripping.

LABEL: 0xD0E
STRING: The air in this musty underground jail is choked with dust.

LABEL: 0xD5D
STRING: Why was I taken here? How long was I confined here? I can't remember.

LABEL: 0xDDE
STRING: I feel like I've been in here for a very long time already...

LABEL: 0xE37
STRING: My cellmate is quietly playing with some stones in his hand, as usual.

LABEL: 0xEAA
STRING: He is throwing a cube-shaped stone up high, and catching it.

LABEL: 0xF08
STRING: It's probably just a way of killing time.

LABEL: 0xF2B
STRING: ...There's no way out of here anyway.

LABEL: 0xF94
STRING: Man

LABEL: 0xFA0
STRING: "Hey, you still alive?"

LABEL: 0xFEC
STRING: The man's voice echoed throughout the silent cell.

LABEL: 0x103B
STRING: He sometimes strikes a conversation like this. And each time I answer with something that seems appropriate.

LABEL: 0x10C4
STRING: Man

LABEL: 0x10D0
STRING: "It looks like this cell is going to be cleared out tomorrow. It might be our last chance to get out of here."

LABEL: 0x11A8
STRING: The man held out one of his old dice, and showed it to me.

LABEL: 0x121D
STRING: Man

LABEL: 0x1229
STRING: "Let's make a bet."

LABEL: 0x127C
STRING: Man

LABEL: 0x1288
STRING: "We each roll the die, and the bigger number wins."

LABEL: 0x12F9
STRING: Man

LABEL: 0x1305
STRING: "The loser becomes the bait and lets the winner escape. How about it? Isn't it worth a try?"

LABEL: 0x1398
STRING: Man

LABEL: 0x13A4
STRING: "You and me both, we're going to be executed soon. So what have you got to lose?"

LABEL: 0x1422
STRING: I'm reluctant as he could be cheating, but I decide to take him up on his offer.

LABEL: 0x149C
STRING: ...Anyway, it's going to be all over soon.

LABEL: 0x14CD
STRING: There wasn't any hope from the start.

LABEL: 0x1522
STRING: Man

LABEL: 0x152E
STRING: "It's settled then. Well, please excuse me."

LABEL: 0x15AB
STRING: He threw the die high in the air, and at last, it rolled on the ground.

LABEL: 0x160A
STRING: The die's face revealed... 6.

LABEL: 0x1661
STRING: Man

LABEL: 0x166D
STRING: "Ah... 6, is it."

LABEL: 0x16B8
STRING: I have no way to win unless I roll another 6 and force a rematch.

LABEL: 0x1747
STRING: I gulped, and rolled the die.

LABEL: 0x17F0
STRING: The die's face revealed a...

LABEL: 0x1905
STRING: My result was 1, huh...

LABEL: 0x1958
STRING: It's the smallest number possible.

LABEL: 0x199C
STRING: It's the same as obtaining nothing.

LABEL: 0x19CD
STRING: I couldn't even come close to him, who got the biggest number.

LABEL: 0x1A20
STRING: I felt inferior, like I'd never be able to catch up, and I was very disappointed in myself.

LABEL: 0x1A99
STRING: I found myself sinking into the depths of despair.

LABEL: 0x1B79
STRING: My result was 2, huh...

LABEL: 0x1BD2
STRING: Its power is a hair's breadth stronger than 1.

LABEL: 0x1C1F
STRING: Unfortunately, it's not nearly enough to win. In the end, is that all I'm capable of...?

LABEL: 0x1C96
STRING: I swallowed the curse words of regret and frustration deep within my chest.

LABEL: 0x1CF5
STRING: In despair I tried to forget about the memories of my past life...

LABEL: 0x1DCF
STRING: My result was 3, huh...

LABEL: 0x1E22
STRING: Its power is a hair's breadth stronger than 1.

LABEL: 0x1E6F
STRING: I just stared at the old dice with my mouth agape and let my mind go blank.

LABEL: 0x1EE2
STRING: At that time I had not yet realized.

LABEL: 0x1F3B
STRING: I left behind at the bottom of my heart a "promise" to my most important person――

LABEL: 0x2023
STRING: My result was 4, huh...

LABEL: 0x2078
STRING: It can't be said to be good or bad, a perfectly average result.

LABEL: 0x20CD
STRING: But life is in the end all about results, so there is nothing to be praised about it.

LABEL: 0x213A
STRING: Games, like other things, don't mean anything if I don't win... there is no meaning in loss.

LABEL: 0x21B1
STRING: I could only watch with sullen eyes as wealth and success slipped out of my grasp...

LABEL: 0x229D
STRING: My result was 5, huh...

LABEL: 0x22F6
STRING: Just one more step, and I could have brought this to a draw and rematch.

LABEL: 0x2360
STRING: But now I will not obtain anything.

LABEL: 0x2391
STRING: I began to hate myself.

LABEL: 0x23DC
STRING: I've always been like this.

LABEL: 0x241F
STRING: Always so close, but fail in the end.

LABEL: 0x246F
STRING: It's no use.

LABEL: 0x2488
STRING: How much longer must I tread the loser's path...

LABEL: 0x256C
STRING: My result was 6, huh...

LABEL: 0x25BF
STRING: I rolled the largest number possible.

LABEL: 0x2603
STRING: Alright, bring it on.

LABEL: 0x2634
STRING: Luckily I can now have a rematch.

LABEL: 0x2684
STRING: But what will happen next?

LABEL: 0x26B3
STRING: For someone shy like me, the next time may not go so well.

LABEL: 0x2710
STRING: Such anxiety passed through my mind as I looked at his fearless smile...
